unnormalised: Hey guys! Loved reading about Mithali Raj's journey. Inspiring! Any suggestions on biographies about hockey players? I'm hoping to find one as gripping as "Chak De! India" was. Maybe someone from a rural background, like UP or Bihar making it big? Or even stories of IIT Delhi alumni who pursued sports. Would be awesome to know. Cheers!
normalised: Hey guys! Loved reading about Mithali Raj's journey. Inspiring! Any suggestions on biographies about hockey players? I'm hoping to find one as gripping as "Chak De! India" was. Maybe someone from a rural background, like U P or Bihar making it big? Or even stories of I I T Delhi alumni who pursued sports. Would be awesome to know. Cheers!
